title: Beef and mustard pie
description: Slow cooked beef makes a wonderful filling for pie. Prepare the meat stew ahead and assemble the pie when you’re ready to cook it.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz beef skirt, cut into large chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
400g/14oz all-butter puff pastry, rolled to 5mm/¼in thick
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper
